item.title: Version 1.2.2
item.description: - Change reaction list in the app. - Update UI clubs discovery - Fix issue events: adding co-organizer doesn't work - Show cluster name - Allow copying text in posts, comments and event descriptions. - Clubs/Channels: All channels overview: hide channels that you are already part of under the 'all channels' overview - Handle deeplink for community guides: support can open in announcement, other apps...

item.title: Version 1.2.2
item.description: - Change reaction list in the app. - Update UI clubs discovery - Fix issue events: adding co-organizer doesn't work - Show cluster name - Allow copying text in posts, comments and event descriptions. - Clubs/Channels: All channels overview: hide channels that you are already part of under the 'all channels' overview - Handle deeplink for community guides: support can open in announcement, other apps...
